attributes.review: this app does nothing it promised in the description. Every time I opened the app it would glitch and shut down without notice. If I could give 0 stars I would!!
attributes.title: HORRIBLE

attributes.review:
i downloaded this app simply to see what our presidents app was all about but then it hacked my phone and wiped everything out  after the 18 weeks it took to download 😭

i’m voting for biden.
attributes.title: worst app ever DO NOT GET

attributes.review: Litteraly the worst app ever!!! DO NOT DOWNLOAD , or I mean do but your gonna waste your time , when I got it .... I somehow stated getting alerts 😯 trump is tracking us ?? I can’t even with it , now I had to move into an random cabinet with my rat joe🤷🏻‍♀️
attributes.title: Ew 🖐🏻🤢

attributes.review:
when i downloaded this app, it gave me a 72-hour warning telling me to donate $500 to the tr*mp campaign, or it would sell all my data. it also said that they were holding my pet cheese for ransom, and that they would eat him if i did not comply with their orders 😞. this app is terrible and i don't wish any of these things to happen to anyone. 

what terrible times we are in...
attributes.title: scared for my life :(

attributes.review: This app has been on and off. Once I decide to open this amazing app, it decides to kick me out over and over again. It is unprofessional and needs to be updated. This app is not recommended for Gen Z 🤣🤩🤪😘😎🙀
attributes.title: NOT PROFESSIONAL

attributes.review: Indeed, sometimes I do not want to be happy. However when I log onto the Donny boy app I expect to be happy. Yet, I don’t become happy. I no longer ever want to be happy thanks to Donny boy and this app.
attributes.title: Sometimes I don’t wanna be happy

attributes.review: The user interface is clunky and also calls me slurs. I don’t really like it. I used to be a trump supporter but it’s clear that everyone on is team hates minorities, going so far as to gatekeep the app.
attributes.title: Terrible

attributes.review: It took me five days to download the app the app is a scam when you enter the app tells you to put your phone number in these things it’s a scam mines was very glitchy
attributes.title: Bad

attributes.review: I thought this was a news app about the election but it is being used to sell children prostitutes!!! This is crazy.... news yes... news that Trump is helping to sell child sex slaves across the US!
attributes.title: Naked kids!

attributes.review: When I first opened the app I SAW a FAT CHEETO😖, I was scared out of my LIFE! This took 12 HOURS to download, and hacked my info and said I needed to pay for an ugly shirt that said “trump 2020”. I CANCELED the order and deleted that app I GIVE THIS A 1 STAR ugh, so disappointed in the dumb app 😤🤡-
attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD
